events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system categorized this customer inquiry under the 'Refund' cluster due to references to refund requests and wrong product delivery.
The case has been assigned to our customer service agent specialized in refund processing.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify your claim?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and I have attached a picture that clearly shows a different item than what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 24 hours.
Great, thank you for your quick response. I appreciate the prompt handling of my refund.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should receive the amount in your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to ensure that you received your refund without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As we have not received any further concerns, your refund case is now closed. Thank you for contacting our support team.
